about.details:
Incorporated in 2011, Mindpool Technologies Limited is a Pune based company engaged in the business of providing Oracle Consultancy Services, IT staffing and solutions, and Corporate Training Services. The company offers these services across industries including automotive and engineering, banking and financial services, healthcare, retail, telecom, and Entertainment in India and US.

As of March 31, 2018, the company has served 22 clients. Some of the key clients of the company include Clairvoyant India Private Limited, Herbalife International India Private Ltd, HTC Global Services (India) Private Ltd, Inspirage Software Consulting Private Limited, and Opalforce INC etc

The company has 103 employees on its payroll.

The total revenue of the Company stood at Rs.1081.35 lakhs, Rs.2043.36 lakh, Rs.2537.77 lakhs and Rs.2078.07 lakh, for the period ended September 30, 2018, and fiscal years 2018, 2017 and 2016 respectively.

The Profit After Tax (PAT) stood at Rs. 146.20 lakhs, Rs. 163.22 lakh, Rs 129.25 lakh and Rs. (33.42) lakhs for the period ended September 30, 2018, and fiscal years 2018, 2017 and 2016 respectively.

Competitive Strengths of the Company-

1. A diverse range of services
2. Presence in the USA through a subsidiary company
3. Recurring business from established clients

faqs.question: What is the Mindpool Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Mindpool Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 1200000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹3.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on February 14, 2019, and closes on February 20, 2019.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Mindpool Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Mindpool Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Mindpool Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Mindpool Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Mindpool Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Mindpool Technologies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Mindpool Technologies IPO opens on February 14, 2019 and closes on February 20, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Mindpool Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: Mindpool Technologies IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Mindpool Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Mindpool Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
